title: ILRI Climate Adaptation Effectiveness – Deliverable 01 Inception Report
citation: Cissé, Jennifer Denno, Zarrar Khan, and Caroline G. Staub. 2025. ILRI Climate Adaptation Effectiveness – Deliverable 01 Inception Report. Version 1.0. Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.17861055
description: This deliverable forms part of the ILRI Climate Adaptation Effectiveness project. It presents the inception report outlining final research questions, PCCM framework, search strategy, stakeholder engagement plan, and project implementation timeline for the evidence-synthesis work on tracking climate adaptation effectiveness for smallholder producers.
